snippet.title: First Look At Amber Heard As Mera In New Justice League
snippet.description:
First Look At Amber Heard As Mera In New Justice League
Subscribe Now! ► http://bit.ly/SubClevverMovies

DC fans, we’ve got your first look at Justice League’s Amber Heard as Mera, queen of Atlantis
Get ready to meet the misses and now, check out Amber Heard in all her Atlantian glory on the set of Justice League
We are still just over a year away from the release of DC’s Justice League movie, and now we’re getting our first look at Amber Heard as the Atlantian queen. IGN exclusively released not only the final Justice League concept art for Mera’s costume, but also an incredible look at Heard in full costume as Mera, taken by the one and only, Zack Snyder, himself. Snyder is directing the DC film, which is slated for November 17, 2017. 
While we can expect that Heard’s role probably won’t be too major in Justice League, we can hopefully expect a whole lot of Mera in DC’s Aquaman movie, to be direted by James wan, and currently scheduled for release in 2018, but it will be nice to see the chemistry between Mera and Aquaman and the rest of the Justice League. 
Along with Justice League, next year, DC will also release Wonder Woman, so we’re in for an incredible slate of movies over the next few years. I can’t wait to see what DC brings to the table, but I want to know if this first look at Mera has you even more pumped for Justice League and Aquaman, so leave your thoughts in the comments below. Then, click right here to get some brand new details from the upcoming Wolverine 3 movie. Thanks so much for checking in with me here on Clevver Movies, I’m Sinead de Vries, and I’ll see you guys back here soon with more movie news.
